tableCards.markdown:
# Table Card: profiles

## Meaning
User onboarding profile (demographic/contact + basic training context). One-to-one with users.

## Primary key
- `user_id (UUID, unique)`

## Fields
- `firstName`: optional str — Given name
- `lastName`: optional str — Family name
- `email`: optional str — Email address
- `phone`: optional str — Phone number
- `goals`: optional str — High level training goals
- `experience`: optional str — Training experience level
- `constraints`: optional str — Schedule/time constraints
- `equipment`: optional str — Equipment access
- `injuriesOrRiskFlags`: optional str — Injuries and risk flags
- `dietPrefs`: optional str — Diet preferences
- `metrics`: optional ForwardRef("'ProfileMetrics'")

## Supported tool mapping
- Get: `profile_get({})`
- Upsert: `profile_save({ profile: { ... } })`
- Delete: `profile_delete({})`

## Verification (required)
- After any write, verify via read-back (get/list) before claiming success.
tableCards.meaning: User onboarding profile (demographic/contact + basic training context). One-to-one with users.
tableCards.name: profiles

tableCards.markdown:
# Table Card: goals

## Meaning
User goals (many per user).

## Primary key
- `id (UUID)`

## Fields
- `type`: required Literal[body_weight, strength, conditioning, performance, other] — Goal category
- `title`: required str — Short label
- `targetDate`: optional Union[str, NoneType] — Target date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `status`: optional Literal[active, paused, completed, canceled] — Goal status

## Verification (required)
- After any write, verify via read-back (get/list) before claiming success.
tableCards.name: goals

tableCards.markdown:
# Table Card: notes

## Meaning
Coach notes (many per user), stored as markdown.

## Primary key
- `id (UUID)`

## Fields
- `type`: required Literal[restriction, preference, equipment, injury, general] — Note category
- `title`: optional Union[str, NoneType] — Optional title
- `bodyMd`: required str — Markdown content

## Verification (required)
- After any write, verify via read-back (get/list) before claiming success.
tableCards.meaning: Coach notes (many per user), stored as markdown.
tableCards.name: notes

function.description: Fetch the current user's onboarding profile.
function.name: profile_get

profile.description: Profile payload shaped like the onboarding draft.

function.description: Dispatch a UI action for the client UI (onboarding drawer, toast, etc). Always include action.type.
function.name: ui_action
